suite.doc: 💾 Datastore Configuration Validation Test Suite - Test-9 🔍 Process: Connect to vCenter → Collect Datastore Information → Validate Datastore Configuration ✅ Pass if datastore configuration meets cluster standards and application requirements 📊 Validates: VM assignments, available capacity, performance tiers, subscription levels
